page.title: 13Glenalmond:House master (2)
page.content: {Daily Routine:}The out-house house master lives in the 'house'. He teaches in the morning until lunch. Around lunch time he does the house 'bank' and then takes games and does some of his own exercise. In the evenings he is always around the house,dining and doing University Entrance forms and options for the next term. {Life Style:}He works a 24 hour day with the help of his wife, being responsible for domestic staff and the things that people are employed to do in the College. One of the out-houses used to be the College sanatorium and the other was the Laird's former residence.
